mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: Janani janani
Film: Thaai Mookaambikai
---

---------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m2 p d2 n3 S
here, r=r2, g=g3, m=m2, d=d2, n=n3 [unless otherwise specified]
---------------------------------------------------------------------


janani janani jagam nee agam nee 
n.n.s  s s s  s n.  r   ss   s
B.B.C  C C C  C B.  D   CC   C

 jaga  kaarani nee paripoorani nee
 m m   p  m g  r   s n.r  s s  s
F# F#  G F# E  D   C B.D  C C  C

jaga kaarani nee paripoorani nee
n n  S  n n  d   p p m  g g  r
B B C+  B B  A   G G F# E E  D

(janani)


Stanza 1:

 oru maan maruvum siru poondhiraiyum
 mm  p    p p p   p m  d   p  p  p
F#F# G    G G G   G F# A   G  G  G

 sadai vaar  kuzhalum idai vaaganamum
 m d   mdnS  n d  p   mg   r  g m p
F# A  F#ABC+ B A  G  F#E   D  E F#G

konda  naayaganin kulir  dhaegaththilae
p  m   md d d nd  p m    md  d   d  nd
G  F# F#A A A BA  G F#  F#A  A   A  BA

 ninra  naayagiyae  ida vaagaththilae
 m  d   mdnSnd p    pm  md p   p  p
F#  A  F#ABC+BA G   GF# F#A G  G  G

jagan  moahini nee simma vaahini    nee
n n    S  S S  S   S  n  nR S S     S
B B   C+ C+ C+ C+ C+  B  BD+ C+ C+  C+

jagan moahini     nee simma  vaahini    nee
n n   nR R R      Sn  Sn Sn  nR R R     Sn
B B   BD+ D+ D+  C+B C+B C+B BD+ D+ D+  C+B

jagan  moahini   nee simma vaahini   nee
n R    GMRn d    p   m  d  nSdSnd    p
B D+  E+F#+D+B A G  F#  A  BC+AC+BA  G

(janani)


Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

chathur vaedhangalum panja boodhangalum
shan maarggangalum saptha theerththangalum
ashta yoagangalum nava yaagangalum
thozhum poongadalae malai maamagalae
alai maamagalae kalai maamagalae (3)

(janani)


Stanza 3: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

svarna raegaiyudan svayamaagi vandha
linga roopiniyae mookambigaiyae
pala thoaththirangal dharma saaththirangal
panindhae thuvazhum mani naeththirangal
sakthi peedamum nee sarva moatchamum nee (3)

(janani)
